text: Jyutping is a romanization for the Cantonese language. It was created by the Linguistic Society of Hong Kong (LSHK) in 1993. == Other websites == * The Jyutping Scheme - The Linguistic Society of Hong Kong * Jyutping Pronunciation Guide * 粵語拼盤 : Learning the phonetic system of Cantonese * Chinese Character Database (Phonologically Disambiguated According to the Cantonese Dialect) * The CantoDict Project is a dedicated Cantonese-Mandarin-English online dictionary which uses Jyutping by default Category:Romanization of Chinese
title: Jyutping
